headline: Is Microsoft Still Attractive After AI Investment Push and Strong Multi Year Share Gains?
summary: Wondering if Microsoft at around $485 a share is still worth buying, holding, or finally trimming? You are not alone, and that is exactly what this breakdown aims to unpack. Over the last week the stock is up 1.5%, roughly flat over the past month at -0.2%, but still sitting on gains of 16.1% year to date and 12.1% over the last year, with a 108.4% return over 3 years and 127.3% over 5 years. Recent headlines have focused on Microsoft doubling down on AI infrastructure and partnerships,...
